trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The wild-eyed miner is afraid for his life.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the wild-eyed miner.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_TODO_01<tab>Defeat Guthlaugur.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the wild-eyed miner.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the wild-eyed miner again.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_000<tab>No, don't hit me! Oh wait, you're not Guthlaugur.

TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_001<tab>He's a local thug who I made the mistake of drinking with. I ended up saying all sorts of things like, “Think you're tough, do you? My mate could wipe the floor with you!” Gods only know why I said that─ There ain't a word of truth in it!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_002<tab>Of course, he didn't see the funny side. He told me to bring this friend of mine or he'd fight me instead!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_003<tab>So, I was wondering... Could you go and sort him out for me? I'll make it worth your while, I swear!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_GUTHLAUGUR_000_010<tab>So, you're gonna “wipe the floor” with me, are you?
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_020<tab>I brought <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, just like I said I would!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_GUTHLAUGUR_000_021<tab>Hmph! Scrawny streak of piss like you? Don't make me laugh.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_GUTHLAUGUR_000_022<tab>I've killed sin eaters with my bare hands, so you won't even make me break a sweat.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_GUTHLAUGUR_000_023<tab>And after I'm done with this feeble sack of shite, you're next!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_024<tab>Eeek!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_GUTHLAUGUR_000_025<tab>Since I'm feelin' generous, I'll let you take the first swing. Better make it a good one, 'cause you won't get a second chance!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_030<tab>If you lose, I'm a dead man!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_GUTHLAUGUR_100_030<tab>I'm gonna make you bleed!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_GUTHLAUGUR_100_031<tab>Stop pummeling me! It's really painful!
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_040<tab>Bloody hells! You actually did it! All right, let's head back before any of the wildlife takes an interest in us.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_050<tab>That ought to take him down a peg or two. I doubt he'll stick around here after a beating like that.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_051<tab>And I'll have to choose who I drink with more carefully from now on. I've got a habit of saying all sorts of nonsense when I'm in my cups.
TEXT_LUCKZG008_03493_MINER03493_000_052<tab>It damn near earned me an early grave, and I'm lucky that you showed up when you did. Many thanks to you!
